title: AI is a ‘double-edged sword’ for utilities – weighing the risk against the benefits
description: Utilities are modernizing the grid for cleaner energy, using AI for planning, as discussed in a DTECH panel moderated by Sundeep Dakarapu.
content: Utilities are modernizing the grid for cleaner energy, using AI for planning, as discussed in a DTECH panel moderated by Sundeep Dakarapu.
